mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice(nno, ntitle, nwriter, ncontent, imgfile) values(seq_notice_nno.nextval, #{ntitle}, #{nwriter}, #{ncontent}, #{imgfile})
mapper.select: select nno, ntitle, nwriter, nregdate, checkCount from tbl_notice
SELECT nno, ntitle, nregdate FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE rownum < 6 ORDER BY nno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set checkCount = checkCount + 1 where nno = #{nno}
